body_html: could you document it a bit more explicitly in the comment? Which way is the broken dependency? I guess cmake considers build.ninja to have a dependency on the generated source files, when it should only have a dependency on <the script that generates them and its inputs/templates>? And this fix doesn't actually remove those bogus dependencies, but by touching build.ninja we pretend that it has taken those changes into accounnt?
